articles.author: Graeme Wearden
articles.title: FTSE 100 nears record high as inflation fears ease - The Guardian
articles.description: Blue-chip stock index ends week 1% off all-time best as markets across Europe rise amid falling energy prices
articles.content:
The UKs FTSE 100 share index approached a record high on Friday, as European markets were lifted by hopes that the inflation shock from energy prices is easing.
The blue-chip stock index, which incl… [+3639 chars]

articles.author: Alex Lawson
articles.title: Hopes of sharp fall in household energy bills as HSBC cuts gas price forecast - The Guardian
articles.description: Bank slashes predicted 2023 European wholesale price by 30% as mild weather reduces demand
articles.content:
HSBC has slashed its forecasts for future wholesale gas prices in response to mild weather in Europe raising hopes of a sharp decline in household energy bills.
The bank cut its 2023 forecasts for t… [+2742 chars]

articles.author: Angela Giuffrida
articles.title: 'Dangerous' Irish plan for alcohol health warnings prompts anger among Italian winemakers - The Irish Times
articles.description: Ireland is free to go ahead with cancer and liver-disease warnings after a deadline passed for the European Commission to oppose them
articles.content:
A plan by Ireland to put stark health warnings on bottles of wine, beer and spirits has caused anger in Italy.
Ireland is free to go ahead with the measure, which would warn consumers about the risk… [+2587 chars]
